item.title: Computational Analysis of Melodic Mode Switching
item.description: This work was done with Asawari Keskar and Dr. Preeti Rao at the Digital Audio Processing Lab, IIT Bombay.

item.description: I came across Max/MSP/Jitter about a month ago with the course called Twisted Signals by Prof.

item.description: This is a presentation of a kajri (semi-classical song). The lyrics are:

item.title: Piyu Bole - with a jazz twist
item.description: This is an adaptation of the famous Bollywood song Piyu Bole, from the movie Parineeta with a twist.

item.title: Malware Detection for IoT devices
item.description: From July 2019 to May 2020, I worked with Dr. Abhishek Tripathi as an intern at McAfee.

item.title: Detection of Malware in Partially Downloaded Binary Files
item.description: From July 2019 to May 2020, I worked with Dr. Abhishek Tripathi as an intern at McAfee.

item.title: Gesture Analysis of Hindustani Singers - Work In Progress
item.description: This work is being done with Dr. Preeti Rao at the Digital Audio Processing Lab, IIT Bombay.

item.title: Raga Tilak Kamod
item.description: This is a presentation of Raag Tilak Kamod that I recorded recently.

item.title: Bus Bunching Analysis and Visualisation
item.description: During a summer internship at Centre for infrastructure, Sustainable Transportation and Urban Planning (CiSTUP), Indian Institute of Sciences (IISc), Bangalore from May 2019 - July 2019, I worked on the visualisation and analysis of a phenomenon called bus bunching using data collected from BMTC buses in Bangalore.

item.title: Roja - Cover
item.description: This is an a cappella arrangement of the title track from the film Roja.

item.title: Waltz for Debby
item.description: Here is our take on Waltz for Debby by Bill Evans.

item.title: Amma Nanu Devarane - Devaranama
item.description: Here are a quick set of drawings I drew on my phone for the song ‘Amma nanu devarane’ to put an Instagram story.

item.title: Nari (Woman) - a collaboration with Ronita Mookerji
item.description: This was a collaboration I did with Ronita Mookerji, a Bangalore based danseuse.

item.title: Square Wheels
item.description: Having spent more time stuck at home than was good for me, I was struck by an inspiration to write an jingle for square wheels.

item.title: Bharathanatyam Dance Performance
item.description: I am a student of Bharathanatyam (Indian classical dance form) under the guidance of Guru P.

item.title: Labb Par Aaye - Song + Dance
item.description: This was a fun cover of the song labb par aaye, from the tv series Bandish Bandits, that I did with my friend Anjali Upadhyaya.

item.title: Ullavarushivalaya - Song for shivaratri
item.description: This is a song by the poet Basavanna in praise of Lord Shiva.

item.title: Appu
item.description: This is a portrait I made of my neighbour’s dog - Appu.
